Summary: Ability to link to media files using rtsp protocol
Description: Currently Confluence doesn't recognize rtsp://filepath/filename.rm as a valid link URL format.  My client needs to specify media files as links.
Creator: Danielle Zhu
IssueLinks: This issue is incorporated by CONFCLOUD-24665

Comments.Author: Danielle Zhu
Comments.Comment: Found out the issue has to do URL encoding.  Change Priority to Minor.

Comments.Author: BillA
Comments.Comment: Thank you for raising this issue. While we can see how this feature would be useful, we have no plans to implement it in the foreseeable future. In order to set expectations, we're closing this request now. Thanks again for your idea.
